caption.center: Claude RICHMOND, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, Appellee.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Warren Circuit Court; Thomas W. Hines, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Gordon L. Johnson, Public Defender Atty., Bowling Green, for appellant.
Ed W. Hancock, Atty. Gen., Thomas A. Ainley, Asst. Atty. Gen., Frankfort, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Memorandum Opinion of the Court by Justice OSBORNE, Affirming.[fn*]
[fn*] Opinion ordered not to be published.
